description.value: Hidden darkness whispers to you, teaching you secrets of shadow beyond other spellcasters of your tradition. Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IqJ9URobmJ9L9UBG]{Shadow Blast}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.tcwT97RWKxsJiefG]{Shadow Siphon}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rxvS7EMJ7qmexAyA]{Shadow Walk}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.srEKUvym9kDVbEhD]{Replicate}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.hvKtmoHwekDZ5iOH]{Shadow Army}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8cuqRFB3mWBOgy61]{Shadow Projectile}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VTb0yI6P1bLkzuRr]{Shadow Raid} to your spell list. You can thus potentially learn these spells even if they aren't normally on your tradition's spell list.
